text: The 6th Annual Streamy Awards are the sixth installment of the Streamy Awards honoring web television series. The awards were on October 4, 2016 at The Beverly Hilton in Beverly Hills, California, hosted by King Bach, it was broadcast live on YouTube. ==Nominees== The nominees were announced in a press release released on August 24, 2016.
